Headline: #8A South Halsted, #108 Halsted/95th Temporary Southbound Reroute near Lowe/127th
ShortDescription: Southbound 8A South Halsted, 108 Halsted/95th buses are temp. rerouted via Halsted, Vermont, Lowe, 127th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Lowe/127th.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Southbound #8A South Halsted, #108 Halsted/95th buses are temporarily rerouted via Halsted, Vermont, Lowe, 127th and Halsted: due to, street blockage near Lowe/127th.

Northbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #60 Blue Island/26th Temporary Westbound Reroute near Taylor/Racine
ShortDescription: Westbound 60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Taylor, Loomis, Roosevelt and Racine: due to, street blockage near Taylor/Racine.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Westbound #60 Blue Island/26th buses are temporarily rerouted via Racine, Taylor, Loomis, Roosevelt and Racine: due to, street blockage near Taylor/Racine.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Headline: #80 Irving Park Temporary Westbound Reroute near Irving Park/Austin
ShortDescription: WB 80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Austin, Montrose, Narragansett & Irving Park, due to police activity near Irving Park/Austin.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #80 Irving Park buses are temporarily rerouted via Irving Park, Austin, Montrose, Narragansett, then resume their normal route at Irving Park, due to police activity near Irving Park/Austin.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: 95th-bound Red Line Service Running with Delays
ShortDescription: 95th-bound Red Line trains are running with significant delays from the area of Howard.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
95th-bound Red Line trains are running with significant delays from the area of Howard.

We are moving and crews are working to restore normal service.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that might serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Allow extra travel time.
